themes: scoring rubric challenges for diverse organizations
eligibility of for-profit venues for funding
lack of oversight for fund allocation
ensuring funds reach musicians and creative workers

the rubric which the panelists had to score from resulted in challenging situations
organizations that served a wide demographic of the community
unclear to me why for-profit venues and bars are eligible for city funds

without an oversight team to ensure those monies are going directly to musicians, production staff, creative workers
what guarantee is there that those funds will actually support the music industry workers
barriers_identified: scoring rubric disadvantages organizations serving wide demographics
funding eligibility for for-profit venues and bars
lack of oversight for fund distribution
solutions_proposed: implement an oversight team to ensure funds go directly to musicians, production staff, and creative workers
reserve Live Music program dollars for musicians and individual creatives
